short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautiful Desert wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Beautiful Desert background. Desert wallpaper themes for scenery fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Cycle through Beautiful Desert wallpapers every time a new tab is opened.
2. Choose a random Beautiful Desert background or pin a favorite in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Quick links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Direct access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add and access websites quickly.
10. Quick links to Google apps.
11. Easy access to additional themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Direct download option for wallpapers.
14. One-click access to games.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on the Beautiful Desert new tab.
